about_the_game:
With his trusty bucket in hand, Pitcher dives into action!

Take control of a young fox named Pitcher as he explores a mountain to find water sources, and bring buckets of water to a dehydrated whale. The mountain is host to dark caverns, mysterious stones, and all kinds of helpful and harmful animals. But nothing is impossible for Pitcher and his bucket!
  • Explore a 2D world by jumping, crawling, and dashing!
  • Put PItcher's bucket in water to fill it up, and bring it to the whale!
  • PItcher's bucket can also break certain rocks, stun enemies, and float on water!
  • The whale slowly dries up as the sun begins to set, so be sure to keep bringing water back!
  • There are gems hidden in the mountain that seem to help the whale somehow...

With his trusty bucket in hand, Pitcher dives into action!

Take control of a young fox named Pitcher as he explores a mountain to find water sources, and bring buckets of water to a dehydrated whale. The mountain is host to dark caverns, mysterious stones, and all kinds of helpful and harmful animals. But nothing is impossible for Pitcher and his bucket!
  • Explore a 2D world by jumping, crawling, and dashing!
  • Put PItcher's bucket in water to fill it up, and bring it to the whale!
  • PItcher's bucket can also break certain rocks, stun enemies, and float on water!
  • The whale slowly dries up as the sun begins to set, so be sure to keep bringing water back!

name: Pitcher and the Whale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A 2D platformer where you control a young fox searching for water to bring to a beached whale. Jump and throw your bucket around to open paths, knock away enemies, and of course, carry water!
